content: सार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [सृ-घञ्, सार्-अच् वा] {@--1@} Essential. {@--2@} Best, highest, most excellent; <ls>Mu. 1. 13.</ls> {@--3@} Real, true, genuine. {@--4@} Strong, vigorous. {@--5@} Sound, thoroughly proved. {@--6@} Highest or best (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); त्रिवर्गसारः <ls>Ku. 5. 38.</ls> --रः, --रं (but usually {%<ab>m.</ab>%} only except in the first {4} senses) {@--1@} Essence, essential part, quintessence; स्नेहस्य तत्फलमसौ प्रणयस्य स <ls>Māl. 1. 9</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 22.</ls> असारे खलु संसारे सारमेतच्चतुष्टयम् . काश्यां वासः सतां संगो गंगांभः शंभुसेवनं .. <ls>Dharm. 14.</ls> {@--2@} Substance, pith. {@--3@} Marrow. {@--4@} Real truth, main point. {@--5@} The sap or essence of trees; as in खदिरसार, सर्जसार. {@--6@} Summary, epitome, compendium. {@--7@} Strength, vigour, power, energy; सारं धरित्रीधरणक्षमं च <ls>Ku. 1. 17</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 74.</ls> {@--8@} Prowess, heroism, courage; <ls>R. 4. 79.</ls> {@--9@} Firmness, hardness. {@--10@} Wealth, riches; गामात्तसारां <ls>R. 5. 26.</ls> {@--11@} Nectar. {@--12@} Fresh butter. {@--13@} Air, wind. {@--14@} Cream, coagulum of curds. {@--15@} Disease. {@--16@} Matter, pus. {@--17@} Worth, excellence, highest perception. {@--18@} A man at chess. {@--19@} Impure carbonate of soda. {@--20@} A figure of speech corresponding to English ‘climax’; उत्तरोत्तरमुत्कर्षो भवेत्सारः परावधिः <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> {@--21@} The heart. --रा {@--1@} Dūrvā grass. {@--2@} Kuśa grass. --रं {@--1@} Water. {@--2@} Fitness, propriety. {@--3@} Wood, thicket. {@--4@} Steel.
